went here on a Rick Steves recommendation, and was so glad we did!  We were looking for a small plates dinner, and this turned out to be the perfect thing.  They had all of the tapas on display, which made me really excited to try things!  We had wine, and the house wine was quite good. We sat at the bar, and our server was very nice and helpful.   Great place to enjoy a meal or for a quick drink and tapas before continuing your evening!
